lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their full potential and help them become successful in life.
lender.occupational_info: My work is challengeing and rewarding.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe in the mission of KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged youth.

lender.name: LATASHA
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a home-based business in which I design custom products for other home-based and small business owners such as business cards, postcards, forms, other printed material that will help them promote their businesses without spending a lot of money.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of "paying it forward" to those who might need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Finance Manager at a car dealership and a Certified Interior Redesigner

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to see businesses do as well as I have.
lender.occupational_info: I plan and organize events and parties for businesses

lender.name: Laura G.
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Sunnie Austin-Sellers
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves - the true gift of giving

lender.name: ron and family
lender.loan_because: The true dividend from giving is knowing that you've made a difference -- a few dollars at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and build data centers that house thousands of computers which run applications for a global investment bank.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed! I also lost a precious pet of mine, and I needed to give back for all the wonderful years of joy he gave us. It makes me feel good inside.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in travel plans over the internet. They can travel by plane, car, cruise ship.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: this is a WONDERFUL way to change the life of someone
lender.occupational_info: When storms hit my country and cause widespread devestation, I go to the site to help people

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I know that there have been times in the lives of myself, my mother and my friends that a small amount of money would have made a huge difference. It gives me great pleasure to invest in someone else and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work for a company that rents and sells equipment to construction companies. My job is to make everything run smoothly in the office, so that the shop and the salesman can concentrate on their jobs.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: I like to empower women to prosper through running thier own business.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Karina
lender.loan_because: "The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches, but to reveal to him his own."

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm so lucky & I want to change someone else's luck & watch them soar!
lender.occupational_info: I love making art and I work in retail,so I'd like to help women who enjoy those things too.

lender.name: Bailey Road Kitty
lender.loan_because: sometimes all someone needs is a chance.

lender.name: Beverlee
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed with spiritual abudance in my life, I want to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired because of the Multiple Sclerosis.

lender.name: Vern
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea and program. Spread the wealth!

lender.name: Coop
lender.loan_because: i've been blessed.

lender.name: margaret
lender.loan_because: "Feeling bad" for others does not change anything. Compassion and action does.

lender.name: Emilie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funding for an art museum.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: Traveling to West Africa many times has changed my perspective on so many aspects of life. I have seen firsthand the conditions in which people work each day to be self sufficient and to provide for their families - especially in the rural areas. They need the support of people from the rest of the world to improve their lives. Despite this, so many people are friendly, proud and hopeful and so interested in bettering their lives and the lives of their families. My family and I are very fortunate to live as we do, and I want to give something to others to help them achieve better lives.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: owner of a dog waste removal service

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I CAN

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I'm so impressed with how many people take the initiative to start their own businesses. I'm also impressed by the wide variety of businesses out there.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales for a software company. I visit customers to discuss the technical capabilities of our software.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to dream about starting a business and lacking funds. Just want to help someone else realize their dream.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: This is how we change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am the associate director for a non-profit social services agency in Minnesota serving men, women and children in crisis.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and always give back to others in need. Its a warm feeling to help.
lender.occupational_info: I was in banking and real estate for 15 years. Good people gave me chances and I worked very hard to be successful...

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I just want to help. We all need help at some point in our lives. It feels good to know that you don't have to be rich to help.

lender.name: Keith, Allyson & Family
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed with the life I have and would like to help others feel the same way!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: this is such a great thing to do!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a home care agent for the elderly

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed, and I like to share my blessings!
lender.occupational_info: I create documents, guides and training for my company.

lender.name: Amber and MJ
lender.loan_because: My husband and I own a business and know the power of someone believing in you enough to loan to your dream. We have been given so much and to whom much is given much is expected! We also want our daughter to grow up giving, and this is a great way for her to participate and learn about other people's way of life!

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I admire people in business that are trying to make in difference in their lives. I have struggled for many years to start my own business; it's still a dream in progress.
lender.occupational_info: I build my own website and is now marketing it, which involves using a lot of softwares to work it thru the seach engines.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: This is the best feeling ever!!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and sell their homes

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Opportunities to get ahead abound in the U.S. We have many safety nets and social services available to those who are struggling. Kiva allows me to provide that same opportunity to those living in countries that don't provide such blessings!

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make capital available to folks who might otherwise not have access to it. Plus, I love the fact that each donation becomes revolving capital to reinvest over and over again. KIVA is now my go-to gift idea - truly, a gift that keeps on giving!

lender.name: TONYA
lender.loan_because: it makes sense. Not only does it make sense, it provides me with an opportunity to give of what I have to change someone else's life. That's a GREAT feeling!
lender.occupational_info: My job as a Public Health Educator is to protect, promote, and preserve the health of the world's people. I study the social, economic, political, and cultural dynamics that impact the overall health of the world.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate to better themselves and to live their dreams.

lender.name: Daria
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy lending a hand-up to others in our global community. I appreciate that Kiva gives me a chance to share. This organization makes it fun and easy.
lender.occupational_info: retired teacher

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: i understand the power of giving, and the importance of the unselfish act.
lender.occupational_info: i help review and write legal contracts for people and businesses.

lender.name: kasey
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should be afforded the oppertunity to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store selling cell phones

lender.name: ANDY
lender.loan_because: I simply feel that helping others is the only true way to enrich ones own purpose and spirit in life. To be able to give to people you don't know, to make a difference in some dark corner of the world, to contribute to some small measure of improvement in an isolated place that someone calls home, is to me - the ultimate statement of humanity, kindness and love.
lender.occupational_info:
I design, configure and build backbone fiber-optic networks that provide Internet & private communications to millions of users across the United States and around the world. (Cisco CCIE Engineer)
Hobbies: travel, photography & enjoying life! :) (Routing packets is fun!)

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have a wonderful start to my career. I believe that those with an entrepreneurial spirit deserve a chance, and can truly change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large retailer.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a productive, self-supported life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator at a medical school.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe a helping hand is a good way for peace and understanding between countries. I believe in helping people be independent.

lender.name: Craig and Judy
lender.loan_because: We want to enable families to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We develop software for health care facilities.

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish, and give him the tools to succeed, and you feed him for life.
lender.occupational_info: I either drive the ambulance, or am in the back of the ambulance caring for the patient, when someone needs to go to a hospital in my community. I do emergency care and transportation of the sick or injured.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction stories -- I've had short stories published and have just completed a full length manuscript.

lender.name: Lene
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life, I have more, than I could have wished for as a child. Life's been good to my family and I. How could I not loan, if I'm lucky enough to be able too?
lender.occupational_info: I love, what I do! Everyday is different. I design floral decor on some days, gardens and homes on others.

lender.name: Lavon
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to assist someone that needs and appreciates the help.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help someone!! You can actually see that if just a handful of people give just a little bit, lives can change!! I'll be giving more!
lender.occupational_info: I sell print music to schools and churches. Music brings people together emotionally. It's the universal language.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people and am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities learn.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.occupation: past president and owner real estate management fi

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: christina
lender.loan_because: Regardless of financial status I believe everyone has a moral obligation to reach out and touch one life at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I believe God intended me to do I take care of and offer comfort and compassion to the sick.

lender.name: Lunaria
lender.loan_because: it feels good. :)
lender.occupational_info: Ive been gainfully employed with the US Postal Service for well over a decade now. I dont think that my job is much to brag about but I am very grateful to have it . My job has enabled me to provide a respectable lifestyle and standard of living for myself and my son. Im proud of the life and little world Ive created for us. I think Ive done a pretty good job and it is only because of where I work that Ive been able to do as well as I have.

lender.name: roger
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others who work hard to earn a living and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange financing for home purchases in the San Francisco Bay area of California, USA

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have the money to help to others. If I can help others to make a better life, then I should do so.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I am educated; I can provide for myself and my family; I can own property; I can vote; I have running water, plenty of food and a comfortable and safe place to lay my head at night.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others succeed as no one achieves their goals in life without help and support from one another. We are connected in profound ways and need to honor the gifts in others!
lender.occupational_info: I both paint and write to express inspiration, joy, peace and contemplation in a world that often moves too quickly for our soul to process. My art and poems hope to give people a place to both rest and renew.

lender.name: Kenyon
lender.loan_because: like to help people inneed. And it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: college student.. work at home depot

lender.name: Unique Gallery
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who need help to better their lifes.
lender.occupational_info: Outstanding! Amazing! Excellent!

lender.name: PayIT4ward
lender.loan_because: There is an intrinsic desire for people to help themselves and not receive a handout. Pride and appreciation comes from looking at the fruit of one's labor, not dependence on others.
lender.occupational_info: By Day - Hard Hat Girl By Night - International Financier

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am able and would like to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them become more profitable.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: People helped me when I was starting out.
lender.occupational_info: Protecting hospital networks from internet-based threats, such as viruses and hackers.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: It does my heart good to be able to help someone make their life better. We are all the same just in different situations and parts of the world.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: As much as god has blessed me through life. i believe i should pass on the blessings to someone else.

lender.name: Patrick & Deborah
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by God and the many people he has placed in our lives. We would like to help be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: We enjoy volunteering at our church and within our community

lender.name: LIISA
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Janell
lender.loan_because: "If I have seen farther than others, it is because I was standing on the shoulder of giants." -Isaac Newton.

lender.name: joanna
lender.loan_because: I can really help someone who needs a little assistance. If we all gave just a little, and helped care for our brother and sisters from all over the world. We would have a much better world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell, market or purchase homes or business.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to create better lives, if only they are given a little help getting started. I feel invested in the success of those I support.
lender.occupational_info: I decorate homes and businesses to create beautiful environments for my clients.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel we are all part of the same family and family is most important. If my helping someone puts them and their family in a more stable place or gets them closer to their dream then I am richer too. Others have helped me, now it's my turn to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am assigned a couple of our largest customers and implement their new programs, monitor & improve their profitability within our company, manage customer relations with mid-level managers and monitor and report on health of these accounts for our company.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I loan because the thought of helping others brings so much happiness. I believe I am so fortunate in my life because of the good I have done for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the residential construction industry. We build homes across the United States. The company I work for is very giving and donates time, materials, labor and money to many charities.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
I want a way to impact people around the world and I feel like this is a productive way to help others.
Yo quiero ayudar los personas que necesitan ayudar. Yo pienso Kiva es una manera bueana a ayudar!

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. We are all one family. Namaste

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe in it and I have also been helped.
lender.occupational_info: Help others who have been traumatized.

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: This project makes a positive impact and I've had nothing but good experiences through my involvement
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a Masters student in art studying in London.

lender.name: louise
lender.loan_because: i want to give back to people in need---they are rewarding me with their hard work i am blessed and wish them the same
lender.occupational_info: I am 73 years old married for 50 years with 3 chi ldren .I WORKED FOR MANY YEARS AND NOW MY WORK IS HELP OTHERS

lender.name: Susan, Steve & Kira
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are so fortunate. We want to help others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much is expected.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Thank God for everything we have...hope we can help as many people as we can.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with who have learning disabilities.

lender.name: KRISTIN
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage a store with around 200 employees.

lender.name: Harold W.
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have an opportunity to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Clergy

lender.name: Johanne
lender.loan_because: I love to help

lender.name: Myriam
lender.loan_because: I am willing to sacrifice such a minimal amount, if it means someone's life can change for the better.

lender.name: Marisa E aka Ritzy P
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and want to lend a hand to women around the world because we are all one. 10% of all sales from my online store will go to my kiva account.
lender.occupational_info: owner, creative director, ceo, coo, sr vp, vp, manager, coordinator, receptionist, accountant, janitor, and mascot of a small design firm.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: All the money I have belong to the Lord who takes care of my family.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It is such a wonderful feeling being able to help people realize their dreams. I love reading their stories and look forward to helping as many as I can.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to move forward. A little donation makes a huge difference.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live their dream and to have pride in what they contribute to their own homes and family, as well as to their community. Being able to help lift the human spirit is the reason I do this.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves that will then improve their lives to the best of their abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student coordinator.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Simply, it is the right thing to do. I can make a difference in a life. Charitable contributions serve an important global social function. Charitable lending will hopefully impact so many lives and be a vehicle in reducing poverty and inequity.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing medical devices, I help bring necessary medical products to physicians who serve patients.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give!
lender.occupational_info: I select merchandise to be sold in stores.

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: it gives a helping hand and this makes a huge difference in their lives and that of their communities.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: I want to help women achieve independence and a better way of life. Women struggle worldwide and I am happy to assist them in my small way.

lender.name: Manon
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I stay home with my son, Nicholas. My husband is a police officer who teaches the D.A.R.E. program, wich stands for Drug Abuse Resistance Education. This is to help kids resist drugs and peer pressure.

lender.name: Christie and Josh
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want others to be successful and to have the opportunity to better themselves and there families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a history major and want to teach. Josh started his own marketing firm nine months ago and works very hard for his family. We want to pay it forward!

lender.name: Celia,Elisabeth &Bridget
lender.loan_because: i have appreciation for how hard it is to raise a family and I am fortunate not to have to live without the resourses I need to do it. I have had a helping hand along the way and truly believe that what comes around goes around! I think this is a great program.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital in the x-ray department; I am the single mom of a 9 and 10 year kids.

lender.name: Patti and Hugh
lender.loan_because: it supports sustainability on a global basis, and it feels good.

lender.name: Eden
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help someone... even better than it felt when I was helped.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician and music teacher.

lender.name: Charleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people start or upgrade their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Attorney

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that help should go directly to people who need it, and I believe that Kiva does that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and composition (writing) to teenagers in high school.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: God loves these people, and they could use some help

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people make their dreams come true!

lender.name: Sara & Michael
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of helping people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I love to help people in need.

lender.name: LINDA
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand to take their first steps in a new direction and it is my privilege and my honor to be able to lend that hand.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, and I want to bless someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I paint very small tropical flowers on very large canvases so it appears as if you could walk into the painting. A small1 inch flower can end up 6 feet in size or larger.

lender.name: Kurlybitz
lender.loan_because: I share because I am very fortunate and I enjoy lending a hand up to enable success for others.
lender.occupational_info: Sr. Telecommunications Engineer

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I can ... and because I have learned through my life how a small amount of money for one person can make a huge difference in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: I am the leaders of a group that provides a camp experience to seriouslly ill children.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all that I have.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand up sometimes.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Since my younger years I've always felt compel to help the less fortunate. In Kiva I was given the chance to do so internationaly.

lender.name: Zap & Sarah
lender.loan_because: We know how important it is for people to be able to support their family in this means so we want to enable others do the same.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: having someone believe in you and knowing that there are people that care that you have a better life should be instilled into every human being all over the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are sick or those that may need surgery.

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Strategist with a focus on outdoor recreation, culinary specialties and furniture consulting - mostly testing the products.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: These stories of initiative, innovation and perseverance in the face of hardship inspire me to use my privilege responsibily.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a public elementary school, to a class of beginning speakers from around the world. I also coach classroom teachers on strategies to meet the needs of their English Language Learners.

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Barbi
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. :-)
lender.occupational_info: Manage a medium-sized computer software office

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It's such an amazing feeling to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: As a registered nurse, I take care of critically ill infants.

lender.name: cristi
lender.loan_because: I wanted to be able to see whatever money I may give will help in someones life. I hope I will be able to help make a difference for them!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Nanny/personal assistant . Take care of 2 children.-wash clothes, clean house and whatever is needed to be done for the household.I feek like a second mother to the Family!

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: well, how can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan for the worst and when it occurs, I help them recover from it.

lender.name: PeoplePawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working families realize their personal and family goals from a financial perspctive.
lender.occupational_info: As a consultant I help private individuals open and operate their own collateral loan retail stores. Another type of short-term banking.

lender.name: Cassedy
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is so nice to help someone out in need. Especially when you know you have it so good and others don't!! God Bless to all who do!!

lender.name: Cheri
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed with a great job and when I get paid I make a loan (providing a payday for someone else).. I was in Zimbabwe for three months while in college and was able to help someone with a gift of 20 USD. I was able to see the difference that can be made by helping one person. So every month when I get paid I provide a loan to others that need a loan hoping to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work on operational projects for an international company that sells general merchandise on the internet.

lender.name: amor
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Why not! We're all one family on planet earth.

lender.name: Linley
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of supporting this group of enterprising women
lender.occupational_info: I make abstract digital art

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It just feels good to give and help others.
lender.occupational_info: Lending a helping hand.

lender.name: Susy
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life. But as a very young single mother many years ago, I really struggled to try and make a good life for my daughter and me. I had so many people help me along the way, so now it's my turn to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a travel agent and have been for 30 years.

lender.name: Pat and Jerry
lender.loan_because: we want to share our good fortune with other people who have the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: We publish a web site , http://beachesbeaches.com, that helps people find beach hotels, hotels really on the beach, not blocks away.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I myself was a single mom of six children who struggled day to day to survive. If a small investment of $25 can help someone have a bright future it will also make my future brighter. It warms my heart. I'm a firm believer that, "it is better to give then receive."
lender.occupational_info: I am a Administrative Specialist in the Juvenile Probation Dept. I love my job. I love children/adolescents.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me his spirit of love and the the spirit to share ,it is my desire to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a daily job to support myself, but my work now is to live a Godly life and allow others to see God through my love and concern for others.

lender.name: Nik & Tonia
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand every now and then.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people who strive to make a difference in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a shop that bakes and decorates sugar cookies. I am fortunate to work for someone who puts family first. I have been blessed to have healthy kids and a supportive husband.

lender.name: tsauci
lender.loan_because: We all have dreams, and I would love to be part of helping a dream come true.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am a widow and the Lord has blessed me and in doing so I want to be a blessing to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the teacher in kindergarden and first grade classrooms.I love children!!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think this is a terrific idea. Everyone who is able to do it, should do it.
lender.occupational_info: I have been happily married over 20 years, I have two terrific daughters. I have an at-home business where I create and distribute driver education materials.

lender.name: Newcomb Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and help others

lender.name: Nerissa
lender.loan_because: These stories speak to my heart. My family lived in conditions very similar to these debtors over 40 years ago. We were lucky to emerge through hard work and education. I respect anyone who dares to do the same.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business and I want to give others a chance to experience the amazing feelng of success. I have also gotten my nephews in to loaning and they have their own account at 8 and 11 years old.
lender.occupational_info: I am the President, Products of Swift HR Solutioins in Seattle, Washingint. We work with early-stage and emerging companies assiting them in the development of a company culture and best practices that all them to keep focused on key business initiatives and revenue generation.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom of two who received help from others during a rough time in my life. I was able to return to school, earn my degree and now want to give to others who are in need.

lender.name: Yen
lender.loan_because: I admire people who work hard to take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: My work build cities and communities that are essential to a comfortable living.

lender.name: TINA
lender.loan_because: Those that have should share with those that have not.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manaer in the Information Technology field(computers).

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I believe people should help people. Depending on governments and institutions is a mistake.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children and also use my skills and time to volunteer in my community.

lender.name: Pepper
lender.loan_because: I am an American but live in the Dominican Republic. My husband and I do what we can here by helping kids with school books, clothes and food.

lender.name: Price Family
lender.loan_because:
we are a young couple who are working hard, while trying to better ourselves. we are trying to create a better world where our baby will grow up and be happy, we know that only by making other people happy and helping each other will there be hope for the future. We are all citizens of the world, and the lives of all of us directly or indirectly affect us and touch us.
We firmly believe we are not citizens of only a country, we think as ourselves as citizens of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mommy trying to continue my studies in law or teaching, I love my job as a mommy right now, is challenging but so rewarding and my husband works as an inventory manager in a car dealership, he works really hard and all the time for our family.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I care - it's a joy to share with those who are empowering themselves for the betterment of their communities and families.
lender.occupational_info: I help others achieve the dream of homeownership by facilitating the financing needed to purchase a home.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: As a succesful business owner I want others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I repair homes.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at a new start in life. Sometimes you need help from a friend to get you over that hump in life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a physical fitness instructor. I care about my students and their own ability to make themselves a healthy life.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to see my money at work for people in need. I am especially interested in helping women and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Retired. Interests are: quilting, needlework, golf, time with grandchildren, reading.

lender.name: Monica M
lender.loan_because: I have so many blessings. God has been so good to me and my family. I don't have time to think of what I have been denied.
lender.occupational_info: Truck/Auto mechanic by trade. Heavy equipment parts procurement for municipal government.

lender.name: mag
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!!

lender.name: Cindee
lender.loan_because: I own my own business and know how important it is to be able to care for yourself and your family doing what you want to do in life. I feel like everyone deserves that chance. It is a wonderful way to connect with the world.
lender.occupational_info: I give stress relieving and injury reducing body manipulation in the form of deep tissue, swedish, and hot stone massage therapy.

lender.name: ida
lender.loan_because: i want to give to people the same opportunity i was given when i was in need.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I'm very impressed with the strength of the people starting these businesses. It makes me happy to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for a drug company as a salesperson. I would like to start a business too:)

lender.name: scarebaby
lender.loan_because: I wish someone had been around to help me when I was just starting out or in great need.
lender.occupational_info: I design gifts and t-shirts that are sold over the internet.

lender.name: Aliseya
lender.loan_because: because it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites for companies and for individuals.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I am called by Jesus Christ to help the poor, the orphans and the widows. I do this out of the blessings God has bestowed upon me.

lender.name: Ezgi
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all you need is a little help

lender.name: John & Doreen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Doreen teaches the hard to teach and John helps owners grow their small businesses

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Justa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than me. I find this is a better way to help families survive. They become independent through having a business. This is the best charity. It's teaching a man/woman to fish instead of giving them a fiish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a very entrepreneurial individual always on the go. I am a real estate broker. I assist people acquire and sell homes.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Help create positive change and move people forward.
lender.occupational_info: To use my passion and enthusiasm to empower, inspire and encourage others to live their highest visions, in a loving and supportive way. Empowering others to create their future, love their life and live their purpose and dreams.

lender.name: Etricia
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need money to start a business. I want to help someone achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I make food for people, dessert. I also make sauces for desserts and salad dressings.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I love to help people & I find myself financial able to do that. It is a great feeling to now I am able to help someone.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: Kiva has opened the door and given me and others the opportunity to be charitable and help others. I Love it!! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK KIVA !!

lender.name: Lucy, Lily and Lilah
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of giving other people opportunities they deserve. I am interested in loaning to women, especially who have children to support. My goal is to support women so they can better educate their children and better their lives for generations to come.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by those who desire to change their own situation as fellow entrepreneurs. I am so blessed and thankful to be a part of their dream.

lender.name: Don & Joanne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with a wonderful family. Kiva is a great way for us to help other families around the world.

lender.name: Darla
lender.loan_because: I want to give and have found a way to help others who need it. I feel wonderful in helping another reach their goals.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help. I would not be successful today without the people that belived in me and loaned me the resources I needed to build my bussiness.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I can make a positive difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a dentist, and I am currently looking for employment.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to be a world citizen

lender.name: Brice
lender.loan_because: I've seen how much a little can do in someone's life. Because I want to help, but faceless charities aren't for me. Because someday, once I am done with school, I want to do micro financing as a job, but I'm not patient enough to wait that long.
lender.occupational_info: I currently am going to University, but to pay for this I work at a few different jobs. I am an office assistant (I file papers, do computer work and answer phones for a company). I also manage the sound equipment for my University (set-up speakers, rent out equipment and make sure all our equipment works).

lender.name: jeri
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make someones life better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be older and not work outside of my home

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I find it thrilling to think I can help someone on the other side of the world, with just a small investment. I hope to continue this for the rest of my life, I enjoy watching the progress of the patrons, and wish I could send them a message to say, good work, well done, you make me so proud,.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: this is a unique opportunity to be part of a team of like-minded individuals making a small investment with an enormous impact. That the investment returns as the loans are repaid and can continue to work for others makes it brilliant.
lender.occupational_info: I write for various publications and also volunteer time to local, national and international organizations, particularly those involved with the preservation of heirloom plants and seeds.

lender.name: Cati
lender.loan_because: I feel karmically obligated. "Investing in women is the most sustainable way to grow a community." Prince Charles, in Harmony
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library at a college. I help people learn to write and how to gather and assemble information.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I can't afford to give money when I don't know if my money is going directly to the cause. This organization seems great and I am glad to help. I usually only give to Native American causes.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a famous tourist attraction and clean up after very messy people.

lender.name: Ute Sonja
lender.loan_because: I like when other people's life is good too, and loans are a necessary part of that journey.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am a self-employed artist, and want to help out where I can-- what a great way to assist other folks around the world. Kiva, you rock!
lender.occupational_info: Musician/actor/comedian

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to be able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Writing and editing--but mostly taking care of Baby H.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: mkd
lender.loan_because: OPRAH for president!! As a single parent, I struggled for years with expenses relating to feeding, clothing, housing and educating my children. Luckily, I was born "middle class" in the United States and had the opportunity to educate myself. So, I already had a good career and still could not make ends meet. I loan because I want to assist parents in their effort to protect, house, educate and raise healthy children.
lender.occupational_info: In my work as a counselor (therapist/ mental health professional), I listen to others and help provide solutions to problems by talking, coaching and consultation. With KIVA, I can help by giving financially.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: My Dad loaned me money to buy land for my first home and a bank loaned me money to start my own business.I wouldn't be where I am today without that "start up" help .It's time to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Help people to learn to walk and move again without pain

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward!

lender.name: FluffyStarr
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who may not have the kind of opportunities I have living in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I sing, and make music, and record songs. I hope I can make a career of it, so that I can help people.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I was lucky to have the support of my family to get me through. I would love to make someone else's dreams come true now!
lender.occupational_info: I work with children each day, teaching them, helping them, keeping them safe, warm and fed.

lender.name: Adrienne & Shaune
lender.occupation: stay at home mom & heavy equipment hauling
lender.loan_because: It's nice to feel like we're helping out.

lender.name: Thyra
lender.loan_because: Friends and relatives helped me out once when I struggled with a small business. I'd like to pass that on.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students and their families to help them finance a college education.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I would like to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: "Ignorance is bliss..." "if you knew you would be in a fight for your life tomorrow, would you train harder today?" "ma! The meatloaf!"

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help others who have not been given the same opportunities as I.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at several colleges. Most of my students are in the nursing profession.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I feel grateful to have been born in America and want to give others the same opportunities we have here.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and I go to school to become a Nurse

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Where's the downside?
lender.occupational_info: Social work

lender.name: Don & Susie
lender.loan_because: We've been helped by others and we'd like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: We help people find homes and business locations.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people in the world, and it feels good to know I'm contributing to the fulfillment of someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a graduate program assistant in a university. Typical duties for me are enrolling students in courses, setting up audio-visual equipment, and providing course material online for students.

lender.name: Manu
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I love helping people. And I love doing it through Kiva because unlike a lot of other orginizations where you can just donate money, with Kiva you actually see who you're donating to and you know a little bit about them. It makes it more personal and I like that a lot.

lender.name: Renoda
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving to those who want to better themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Tracey-ann
lender.loan_because: To feel good,to make someone smile.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to have someone believe in your dream and put their money where their mouth is. My father has always supported my wild and crazy endeavors and now I'd like to support yours!
lender.occupational_info: I rent cameras out to producers and cameramen who create motion pictures, documentaries and other multimedia for entertainment and education.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to start a business of my own and know how hard it is to find funding.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying so that I can achieve my goals and be successful.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I think it's good karma to do what we can to help others who are really working hard for their goals.

lender.name: Yoshi
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who can help themselves! I want to make a difference in people's lives for future success.

lender.name: Mikini
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone realize their dream. Everyone deserves a chance to become a success story, no matter how big or how small their goals are.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the realm of Information Technology in the area of Security.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I've been blessed and when I needed help someone was always there for me. I want to be there for someone else. I believe in these people and I want to help in the only way I know how.
lender.occupational_info: For many years I supplied hospitals with medicine and nutrition products. I was paid well for my work and now that I am disabled this is my way of giving back to the world.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: because I can. I think this is one of the most inspiring ways of giving back, and I'm proud to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I travel the United States doing service at 30,000 ft. Taking our passengers from point A to point B in safety and comfort, in a professional and courteous manner. When I'm on the ground, and the Spirit moves me, I will perform at one of our New York cabarets/clubs, or at a special event outside of the City.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I have always said, what can I do, what can I do, and now this site is one answer.
lender.occupational_info: I sell magazine advertising space for people wanting to sell homes.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: helping/loaning brings a good feeling inside me...... thanks

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I CARE, and want to see others succeed in life. You put your mind to anything you will go farther then you ever dreamed.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work due to illness however I am receiveing disability and if it weren't for GOD and my FAITH, I wouldn't be able to do this with my whole heart. It make's me feel better.

lender.name: Lady Cunegonde
lender.loan_because: I was given enormous opportunities that my immigrant parents and grandparents could never have imagined. I want to give someone else a hand up so that they can achieve the same unimaginable future for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make money thru consulting, Ebay and any other way I can while also trying to appreciate the gift of life I've been given.

lender.name: Leroy
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a life of abundance, and am grateful for the chance to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to make an investment in people and their potential. It's an investment where the rate of return is not measured in percentages, but rather the hopes and dreams our loans can foster.
lender.occupational_info: I offer advice to families on how to invest their savings.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to make a difference, no matter how small!

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to create change when they have the support and the resources they need.

lender.name: Daddy Michael & Peppy
lender.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to work deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My daughter Perpetua and I serve God through his Son Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit people to work for my company.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful opportunity to be able to help those less fortunate and in need. Most of these people are hard working and want to make their lives better for themselves and their children. This program is a great way to help them come closer to reaching their goals and fulfiling their dreams. Just by being a small part of their success and happiness makes it worth it.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and would not have this life without many people who helped me along my own path - it is only right to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer. I write for magazines and am a novelist. I have a small home based business making jewelry. I also work in a call center where people call to make insurance claims.

lender.name: Susan and John
lender.occupation: John is an engineer; Susan is a paralegal.
lender.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy and fun way to help someone out.

lender.name: Tutu
lender.occupational_info: Help people buy a home.

lender.name: Sandra and JB
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and I was raised by wonderful parents and grandparents who always helped others in need. I also donate in memory of my Father Joseph Bueno (JB) who passed away March 19, 2010.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work due to illness

lender.name: Liba
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro finance can help people achieve their dreams and improve their lives. I've done a good deal of traveling and love connecting with people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large international organization which defends human rights around the world. I help raise money for the organization and organize awareness campaigns around the issues.

lender.name: Robert and Daphne
lender.loan_because: I had a very primative upbringing. Woodburning cook stove, carrying water, heating water for baths, raising our own animals and garden for food. I know how hard it is to live, and all the hard work. My situation has changed and now we are able to help some other people and hopefully it will create a circle and those people will help others.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it is a joy to share with others.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It's something we should all do...help each other.

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone who is in need. I like knowing how the money is being used and that the people getting the loans are working hard to have better lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher at elementary schools (children 5 years old - 12 years old) for almost 30 years. I now teach classes to teachers and other educators.

lender.name: J Elaine
lender.loan_because: I care that others are working hard to succeed in this hard life. I want to help and hope that you will also help others when you are able.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital typing patient medical reports. I am a single mom that raised three successful children. I worked hard to teach them to love God, be successful, and help others in need.

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: it helps some one succeed

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I can - and I believe in the difference one person can make.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for many years in the Career Development field helping people find employment and a sense of value in the work they do.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It seems like a helpful thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Food store

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in life and I want to pass on that blessing to someone wanting to make something of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and with a special machine I can see inside your body and tell you what might be wrong.

lender.name: Barbie
lender.loan_because: I loan because it feels good and I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: Send Out Cards is a way for me to keep in touch with all my friends and family and act on my promptings.

lender.name: Ali & Kristofer
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed with abundance. There is always enough to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are actors and singers who perform in stage and television shows. We feel so blessed to have a job that we love and that allows us to give back to the world.

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference in this world. Reaching out to help others is an important way for us to remain connected across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work in both non-profit and real estate.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: There, but for the grace of God, go I. It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, dealing with customer service issues.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse who takes care of premature and sick newborns.

lender.name: Rima
lender.occupation: Teacher of English as a Second Language

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I care. I really like the idea that we can help one another. I believe it draws us closer to living in harmony.
lender.occupational_info: I sell RV's and help Merchants save money with the lowest rates on credit card processing in the western USA

lender.name: leah
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I have had many blessings in my life and I want to give because it is rewarding to see how someone's life can be improved with very little. Simply, I am happy to see others happier as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a diverse artist having the most experience in portrait painting since the age of 11. As well I have had my own decorative painting and faux finishing business since 2000. Presently I am working on my first children's book written by a dear friend and author in LA, while living out my dream of living in Italy again. Life is a blessing!!!!

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance for a better situation in life.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me to bless others.

lender.name: Dustin & Kirissa
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Helping people help themselves is a great use of resources.
lender.occupational_info: Dustin talks on radio and TV stations and also records his voice for different companies who want to train employees or share information. Kirissa helps people to buy houses.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: I dwell in possibility.
lender.occupational_info: property management

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help fellow human beings and knowing I am making a difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I saw a program on television about Kiva and thought it was an excellent idea. Instead of just donating money to a big charity you see the person you are helping. Getting the money back to loan to someone else is wonderful. Every day I try to do positive things to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I love photography and have worked as a photographer, writer and editor. The profile photo is of my grandmother in the 1920s with flowers that were probably from a relative's flower growing business in the U.S. state of Ohio.

lender.name: Marlin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help, and it just feels good to do so.

lender.name: Jesse and Sarah
lender.loan_because: we are very fortunate in our lives and we would like to help those in need who are working hard to succeed and provide for their families.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about the possibility of providing financial assistance to someone in another part of the world from my keyboard in my own home. I have always believed that the internet could revolutionize the world and to me, Kiva is a step in that direction.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner or co owner of several businesses, including a daycare and a recording studio.

lender.name: Kammie
lender.loan_because: To help people better they're lives, and take care of family.
lender.occupational_info: It is a restaurant that sells Chinese food, and I take it to peoples homes for them so they don't have to leave the house.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care. Along my life, I have been given many oppurtunities to succeed, mostly because someone believed in me. I want to give that feeling back.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently going to school to learn Dental Hygiene. After that, I hope to volunteer my time educating people in other countries on the importance of good dental care.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I thought I knew what it meant to be a starving artist... but what a silly phrase it is when you see people in real need on this fantastic website! I am thrilled to help!
lender.occupational_info: I make my money in three creative ways. As a photographer, I travel and take beautiful black and white photographs and sell them online and in galleries. I run a graphic design business creating logos and advertisements for other businesses. I sing for radio commercials. All gifts and nothing but faith every day.

lender.name: bailey,mommy & harley
lender.loan_because: it 's always better to help others improve their lives. Peace
lender.occupational_info: i provive health care to people

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to possibly give someone else a little encourgement.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the city at a jewelry store and live near the beach (pictured) with my husband.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want people in other countries to have the same opportunities that we are afforded in America. It takes hard work, dedication and a belief in one's self that drives success and changes lives.....no matter who the people or what the country...
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal pain and dysfunction.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive difference.

lender.name: Debbie & Family
lender.loan_because: I value the opportunity to help change a family's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am the administrator of a public library.

lender.name: SUZI
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I want others to have a good life and know that I have helped in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange trips from my office at home. Vacation trips, cruises and business trips.i have been doing this for over 30 years.

lender.name: Bill, Janey, Ty & Asia
lender.occupation: Sales, Teacher & Joy of My Parents Lives
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our children the joy of giving and helping people.

lender.name: Carl and Alexis
lender.loan_because:
For two reasons:
1. To share with others the incredible blessings that have been given to me by my Lord and Saviour, Jesus Christ, and
2. To promote Compassionate Capitalism, which is the road to true freedom, both as a person and a country.
Freedom is second only to salvation with regards to gifts from the Heavenly Father to His creation.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Registered Nurse in long-term and rehabilitative care, but I am working on becoming financially free through entrepreneurship and social marketing.

lender.name: ÃÂ§Â§rÃªÃ¿Â®
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scholar and a lady; queen of all matters; erudite in all subjects; patrician among plebeians, and a world citizen.

lender.name: The Castro Family
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need and are excited to see this organization and support it's purpose.

lender.name: Mauricio and Teresa
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit is probably one of the best ways to make a difference in peopleâs lives in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that provides educational services for Latin-Americans and Canadians.

lender.name: Corina
lender.loan_because: Helping someone is what makes life good.
lender.occupational_info: A regular day includes working on budgets, contracts, and special projects to make the engineering department more efficient.

lender.name: The Milligans
lender.loan_because:
"Well done is better than well said"
"He that hath a trade; hath an estate."
.Benjamin Franklin
lender.occupational_info: I help families find and purchase homes and help them sell their homes for the best price when they need to move to another home or community. Often they move for better jobs or better schools for their children. It is very rewarding to help someone who has never owned a home and see their smile when they finally do reach their goal of a new home of their own!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else do what I am in the process of doing, which is opening a new business, and building a new home. The best way to get what you want, is to give it away to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I sell women's apparel, costume jewelry, hats, and accessories. I am in the process of opening a boutique this fall, called Metamorphosis Wardrobe & Accessories Boutique, in downtown Silver Spring, MD.

lender.name: Casey & Cam
lender.loan_because: I wish there were more opportunities to give where I know the money will be put to good use!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government helping the citizens of my city to stay safe.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service Agent with an airline.

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: This is a small way to help other people
lender.occupational_info: Sterile processing technician

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We all should; Pay it forward.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to do so and i love the chance to give other people opportunities to fulfill their own life's desires and dreams.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I have been in need many times and have had people give to me. Giving is my way of showing my gratitude and it really is more fun to give than recieve.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money and hire people to build houses. I then sell these houses.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.....to others less fortunate.

lender.name: Shari Carlson
lender.loan_because: I believe a little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I coach Actors and Singers to become all they are.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I feel that small sacrifices here in American can lead to large gains around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on DNA vaccines and cancer treatment drugs. Some of the vaccines I am working on are AIDS, Bird Flu, and a Skin Cancer treatment. All of our drugs are still in testing stages, but several are getting closer to release.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I've had times in my life where others helped me to get a foot up. I worked hard to deserve that help, and can now pass it along to others. It's a little bit that can mean so much in a life.
lender.occupational_info: I was a single mother, hired to work in a medical office, at a university. I taught myself to use a computer, and then to look for any way to make my boss's work more efficient. I tried to see problems ahead and to offer 2 or more possible solutions. This way I became indispensible and worked there for 15 years.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women across the world become succesful, independent businesswomen. I think every woman deserves a chance at that.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from Stanford University in the state of California. I studied political science and sociology there.

lender.name: Cheri
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office by making sure the office runs smoothly. I order computers and cell phones for the staff, I hire the secretaries, I make sure everyone has what they need.

lender.name: Mandie
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world who deserve a chance to make something of themselves, to make a better life for their families. I have seen first hand what a little help can do. It truly can, change the world.
